sermons.title: (Genesis) - Part 12
sermons.description: What does Nimrod, the first king, warn us about in our spiritual lives today?  Brother Zac uncovers the spirit of Babylon--making plans without any consideration of God's will and desiring to rule and dominate others through soul power or money power.  "The greatest delusion of all," he warns, "is having the language of Jerusalem with the spirit of Nimrod."
